730218f-a.title: General view - [Manhattan - 4th Street - Avenue A (North).]
730218f-a.text:
A general view, north from 4th Street and Ave., A.
August 31, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.

732817f-c.title: Recreation and hobbies - Bird raising.
732817f-c.text:
Rtecreation and Hobbies: Bird raising on East Side roof as viewed 8outhwaro from another tenement roof on East 4th
Street to the west of Avenue A.
The buildings in the foreground are No's. 166 to 170 East 4th Street, that with the pigeon coop atop is No. 168. In the bacground appears the steeple of St. Nicholas Catholic Church at No. 1123 East 2nd Street.
August 31, 1928
P. L. Sperr
Views 2 and 3 show pigeon coops in the suburban
parts of Brooklyn.
View 2 P.L.Sperr  July 27, 1935
Neg. ~27e7
View 3: E.L. Armbruster Collection  About 1922
732817f-c.folder: 4th Street (East) and Avenue A  , Manhattan, N.Y.
